BIO

My name is John Anthony L. Balbin. I am a Software Engineer, Web Developer, and a Freelancer. My passion for web development could be traced back to when I was a high school student. I am always curious about how the web works whenever I browse the internet. I am always excited to discover something new about it and that urged me to take Information Technology in college. During that time, I learned different programming languages but still, web development is my passion. I created different web sites and applications during that time. Excitement always fulfilled me when I'm about to start a new project and satisfaction when I finished it with quality. Now, even though I am already a professional, I am always open to new learnings and knowledge in the field of IT. As a matter of fact, I enrolled in a course by Clever Programmer called Profit With Javascript to improve my skills.
